articles.description: June 2022 SUV Sales - Tata Harrier Achieves Impressive YoY Growth. Toyota Fortuner Has Posted Nearly 6 Times More Sales This Time
articles.content:
Among the top 10, Tata Harrier has posted the highest YoY growth this time
June 2022 SUV sales was a mixed bag with some models registering positive growth and the others witnessing de-growth on a Y… [+4524 chars]
